title: Bug 2529: Open/Close project not always available
description: Bug 2529: The Open Project menu item is available but the Close Project menu item is not always available when both P1 and P2 are selected.
OB: When both P1 and P2 are selected, the Open Project menu item is available but the Close Project menu item is not.
EB: When both P1 and P2 are selected, either both the Open Project and Close Project menu items should be available or neither should be enabled.
SR:
1. Launch the application.
2. Select both P1 and P2 from the project menu.
3. Observe the availability of the Open Project and Close Project menu items.
